projects.title: Given Projects
projects.description: 'Ataa Palestine' seeks to provide a safe, effective, and productive community, and the first 'Dar Al-Raja' community has been launched. 'Ataa Palestine' seeks to provide a safe and effective community.

success-stories.title: Success stories
success-stories.description: 'Ataa Palestine' seeks to provide a safe, effective, and productive community, and the first 'Dar Al Raja' community has been launched. 'Ataa Palestine' seeks

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: At Ata'a Palestine Association, we believe in the power and impact of giving. Through years of fieldwork, we have delivered humanitarian, cultural, and educational initiatives that contribute to building a safer future for the children of Palestine.

news.title: News
news.description: Follow the latest news and achievements of the Ata'a Palestine Association, from humanitarian initiatives and development projects to the success stories we create together on the ground. Here we share with you hope, progress, and everything else.

hero.title: Dar Al Raja Communities
hero.description: Ata'a Palestine seeks to provide a safe, effective, and productive community. The first Dar Al-Raja' community was launched as a pioneering idea to help alleviate the burdens of war on the Gaza Strip, where the Dar Al-Raja' community is located.

final-section.title: We plant hope in the hearts of children so that we may reap a safer and more stable tomorrow in Palestine.
final-section.description: We believe that every child deserves a chance to dream, and we are here to create that opportunity for them.

footer-email.email-title: Stay in touch with us by:
footer-email.email-description: At Ata’a Palestine, we strive to build a safer world based on professionalism and reliability.
